main.name: Sandesh Mankar
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: A passionate, forward-thinking developer offering more than 5+ years of experience including 2 years as freelancer building, integrating, testing, and supporting Web and Native Mobile Application. and Quick learner with strong interpersonal skills and proven ability to manage the positive and productive client relationship, problem solver.

work.title: Full Stack Engineer
work.description: Currently working as a front end team leader on Casino project Framework-javascript Vue.js Nuxt Single-page Application. and NodeJS used for Socket.  ● Participating in the design and creation of scalable software. ● Writing clean, functional code on the front and back-end  ● Testing and fixing bugs or other coding issues. ● Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions ● Design client-side architecture.

work.title: Team Leader
work.description: Managed all the IT projects in this company (ie 6projects) Worked as a team leader and managed 5 team members by assigning respective tasks to them Also contributed to app and web Deployment on server. ● Write technical documentation,  ● Writing clean, functional code on the front and back-end. ● Testing and fixing bugs or other coding issues. ● Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Worked on real estate products and Multi-Level Marketing. Also worked on Project Management and File Management ( One Cloud). ● Write technical documentation with all team Members. ● Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design. ● Design client-side and server-side architecture.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
